TopicTitle: How do I take a soil sample

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I have had numerous trips to different regions on Mun, Min, and Kerbin. How do I take soil samples during EVAs? I just can't wait to get the extra science.

Thanks,

Liam

Edited December 30, 2013 by Templars

Exit the vehicle, make sure you are on the surface, rightclick your astronaut and choose "Take surface sample", choose to keep data. Return your astronaut to the capsule, you will have the sample stored in the capsule. Return the capsule to Kerbin, "recover vehicle". Voila.
